hours_text:
# Plan Your  
Next Voyage

# A visit to the Foss Waterway Seaport lets you experience the sights, sounds and classic beauty of our historic building, maritime exhibits, Heritage Boat Shop, and education Center, Plus Panoramic views of Tacoma's waterfront.  
  
Foss Waterway Seaport is open to the public   
Thursday - Sunday 10a-4p

admission_text:
### Plan Your Visit

Did you know you can visit by boat? Just pull up to our public docks where you can enjoy free moorage for up to four hours!   
  
The Seaport offers art, maritime exhibits, and hands-on activities for a wide range of ages. Bring the entire family for a day to remember.  
‍**  
Museum Hours:  
** Thursday-Sunday 10a-4p  
plus every 3rd Thursday until 8p**‍**  
  
**Admission:**  
Now **FREE** for everyone!  
  
**Save the Date:**  
Saturday, January 10, 2026 - **_CLOSED_** _for a private event_  

### Group   
Exploration

With advance notice, we can assign a docent to lead your group tour! Please use the link to book a tour or call us at   
253-272-2750.

[Book Your Group](/contact-foss-waterway-seaport)

## **Seaport Events**

From the Grit City Costume Paddle, to our annual Chowder Social fundraiser, we are on track for all of Tacoma's memorable events in 2025 and beyond!

# Chowder Social

Support the Seaport at our annual fundraiser in 2026!

[Learn More](https://www.fosswaterwayseaport.org/blog-post/chowder-social-fundraiser)

# Tacoma Ocean Fest

Arts, science, and water fun.  

[Learn More](https://fosswaterwayseaport.org/blog-post/tacoma-ocean-fest)

### Membership

As a member you will join a large group of people who are saying “Yes! We want a waterfront gathering place that highlights the history of Tacoma’s working waterfront and offers access to on-water education opportunities and recreational fun.

[Become a Member](/support-foss-waterway-s...
collections_text:
[](/)

# _Discover_  
Foss Waterway   
SEAPORT

# Come explore our region’s   
extraordinary maritime heritage!  

NOW OFFERING FREE MUSEUM ADMISSION FOR ALL!

[Plan Your Visit](/visit-foss-waterway-seaport)

### Experiences at the Seaport

Come explore our region’s extraordinary maritime heritage! Learn how the people, boats, and industries that built the heart of Tacoma have shaped our future and changed the way we view the treasures of Puget Sound.  
  
**Mission Statement:**   
The mission of the Foss Waterway Seaport is to celebrate Tacoma’s rich maritime heritage – past, present and future. **  
  
Vision Statement:  
** To create the region’s most compelling maritime heritage education and recreation resource.  
  
**Museum Hours:  
** The Foss Waterway Seaport maritime museum is open to the public for FREE Thursday through Sunday, 10:00 AM-4:00 PM  
\+ every Third Thursday of the month until 8:00 PM  

# Experience

The voyage of discovery starts at the Foss Waterway Seaport. Bring the whole family and experience this historical maritime wonder.

[Discover](/discover-foss-waterway-seaport)

# Education

Discover where history meets science with exciting, hands-on learning activities.  

[Learn](/education-foss-waterway-seaport)

# Events

We host a variety of unique events...private and public. We hope to see you come aboard at one of our upcoming events!

[Venue](/venue-foss-waterway-seaport)
